website_summaries.verdict: You won't find a better deal in this price range, especially given its multi-functionality. Definitely the best bang for your buck.
pros: A must-have for travelers looking for excellent back/neck/head support
Can be used as a pillow or for lumbar support
cons: It can be tough to get all the air out of this pillow, making it tricky to pack in a smaller bag

customer_reviews.title: Great for an overseas flight
customer_reviews.text: This worked well on a recent trip to Europe. The picture shows putting the elastic strap around a headrest, but I put it around my neck and it worked well to keep the pillow in place behind/beside my head. I also used it for back support sometimes. It self-inflates to a point, but if you want more firmness you can blow into it to fill it more. To pack it away, I just opened the air thing and rolled it up to push the air out and it fit in the bag rolled up. The cover is really soft and I like that it's removable so I could wash it when I got home.
customer_reviews.author: PW

customer_reviews.title: Great back support!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many inflatable back supports before this one. And this one is the best. It holds its shape when inflated really well. Since it is inflatable, you can adjust the support level. I have taken it on over 10 flights and would never travel again without it. I have back issues and flying has been almost unbearable before I found this back support. I would highly recommend this back support for anyone who needs back support. I like it so much I am going to get one for the car also!
customer_reviews.author: Krysten

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable for Air and Rest - Especially for Neck support
customer_reviews.text: Took this on a 25+ hour RT air + several hours on busses and cars trips...and slept with it in bed...terrific compact soft travel pillow...they have a layer of foam inside which is nice...gives it some substance + you can inflate more with air (if needed)...really great design...especially for neck and lumbar comfort...I used it in both places.
customer_reviews.author: Regina M Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Good inflatable travel pillow
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this pillow. It was easy to carry and inflate. The strap to hold it on the seat back was. Or helpful because of the viewing screen on the back of the seat for the passenger behind me. The inflating feature to provide personal comfort was very nice. I found it most useful to place against the wall of the plane for my head. Love be the color and plushness of the fabric. The carrying case is very nice, sturdy and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: MSUMindy

customer_reviews.title: The jury is still out for me
customer_reviews.text: I am a first time user of a neck product for long trips but I found this to be not as useful as I thought. During a long night flight it launched itself out into the airplane aisle and I had to retrieve it from the flight attendant after the flight. I have not given up yet but need to experiment with inflation and fastening. The seller communication was excellent.
customer_reviews.author: David Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Pillow!
customer_reviews.text: I travel a lot and am always looking for a comfortable travel pillow... this is it! It works great when the airplane seat won't recline. Just fill iit with air and it feels so great behind your neck. If you need back support, this works great for that too! I even use this while watching TV at night in the recliner. You can adjust how much air you need for the perfect amount of comfort. It is great!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Vitale

customer_reviews.title: Love this little pillow!!
customer_reviews.text: Love LOVE this little pillow. I'm 60 years old and have arthritis in my neck. I need my neck supported with my neck straight not tilted forward like a lot of pillow will do. I ordered several others to try that we're much much more expensive but I woke up with a sore neck and a headache. This pillow is perfect. Thank you I'm sleeping so much better!!!!
customer_reviews.author: mspita2u

customer_reviews.title: Won't hold air, assembled poorly
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my trip to the UK. It did not make it past the initial blow up as the stichting missed on assembly so it does not hold air. I tried to return it, but since I waited until I returned I can not. I would not purchase this product, and if I did, I would inspect it closely upon arrival prior to trip.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Brophy

customer_reviews.title: Stiff, Scratchy edges.  Lumbar yes..neck, no
customer_reviews.text: I like this support. I have used it for both back and neck. It is easy to get to the right amount of support for the back or neck. My only complaint is the edges of the pillow are very stiff hard plastic and they are uncomfortable on my neck. It should have covered edges or a pillow case for this purpose. Very good for lumbar, not for neck. I use it on my office chair and recliner. Would like to use for my neck for road trips. That won't happen...uncomfortable and scratchy edges.
customer_reviews.author: P. Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Backrest with strap prevents loss
customer_reviews.text: This is a good inflatable pilllow that I used as lumbar support. While it may look goofy, I love the strap which I put around my chest to keep from losing it. I have lost countless lumbar pillows in planes, rental cars, and theaters. Only thing that would make it better is a latch on the belt so you don’t have to pull it over your head.
customer_reviews.author: Payton L

customer_reviews.title: Slightly bulkier than expected when deflated.
customer_reviews.text: The pillow is easy to inflate and deflate. The design allows me to sleep on my side but still wear noise-cancelling headphones, with the pillow supporting my neck and the headphones fitting into the empty space at the curved part of the pillow. I also purchased the pillowcase cover, and that makes the pillow a lot more comfortable for all night sleeping. The product, when deflated, is a bit bulkier than I'd anticipated. It can hook onto the outside of a carry-on, which is not ideal for me, but I can live with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel
customer_reviews.text: I usually use a memory foam neck support pillow with small roll on one side and larger roll on other but too big to take with me when I travel by plane. Purchased this for a recent cruise and it worked great. Felt a little small at first and too firm, but the great part of this pillow is that you can easily let out a small amount of air at a time, even while your head is on it, and that way you can adjust the amount of firmness you want. Worked great for me and easy to take out all the air and pack in carry on bag.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda Katz

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't even have a valve to pump it open AND it does NOT look like the photo
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could rate it as a freaking ZERO! I received a defective product! It doesn't even have a valve to pump it open AND it does NOT look like the photo! This was a scam. So upset I can't take this on my trip to France. Worthless piece of crap. *inserts angry face* So disappointed........and now trying to figure out HOW to RETURN it.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Great support front or back
customer_reviews.text: This was one in a long line of travel pillows. Had a recent coast to coast flight in first class. So while the strap provided would not fit around the seat back (as described) I did find that I could put it over my head, around my neck, and put the pillow part to the front. The curve in the middle of the pillow lines up perfectly with my jaw/chin and I slept comfortably sitting up, my mouth didn't hang open, and I didn't feel like I was getting strangled.
customer_reviews.author: BRENDA L. HOFF, CPA

customer_reviews.title: Love this little pillow
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these pillows for my husband after he had to remain laying flat in a hospital bed for eight hours following a vascular procedure. He was extremely uncomfortable and not a very good patient! He was then scheduled for major vascular surgery in five days. I ordered these pillows from Amazon & received them before the surgery. They were perfect. With very little inflation, we could tuck these pillows just about anywhere for relief of joint or muscular pain. What a find & just in time!!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Langham

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: I've tried several travel pillows and this one is the best by far. It is impossible for me to sleep on any mode of transportation but this pillow allows me to completely relax and enjoy the next best zone to sleep. The shape of it assures me that my head won't flop around like a stuffed teddy bear if I allow it to inflate to the proper level. Inflating and deflating are easy but I don't try to stuff it in the bag. Not worth the effort. I'm buying at least 3 more for family members who travel extensively. This is a total winner in my book.
customer_reviews.author: Biggy

customer_reviews.title: This is a superior pillow. It holds the air firmly without deflating
customer_reviews.text: This is a superior pillow. It holds the air firmly without deflating, at any point of inflation desired. It has a fiber or fabric exterior, so it is not cold against your skin. I use it horizontally for lumbar support and vertically for full-spine support, in bed. It works wonderfully and allows me to spend hours, working on my computer, with less or no back pain. It is sold by a small family-owned business, which is immediately responsive and provides superior customer interface and customer service. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t stay inflated!
customer_reviews.text: This thing DID NOT STAY inflated—from right out of the box. Too bad BC it would have been perfect if it’d worked! 😭 Im happy time try again if the company wants to send me a new one. In the meantime though, I’m going to have to try a different one.
customer_reviews.author: D. Rongstad

customer_reviews.title: You Need This Pillow
customer_reviews.text: Finally a travel pillow that works! It stays in place, is easily adjustable, and the bag has a clip for attaching to the outside of the carryon without taking up precious room. On an 11 hour flight, I used this as both a neck and back pillow, depending if I was sleeping or reading. On the train, it helped me get a few winks, and in the hotel, it gave me the extra support missing from too flat pillows. On top of all this, the sellers were super responsive when I reached out regarding a slight issue. I will never travel without pillow again.
customer_reviews.author: elflaco

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a trip around the world on multiple long haul flights. My plan was simply to use it was lumbar support and it deflated after 3 minutes of use every time. I tried to let it inflate in the air, on the ground, tighten the cap, loose the he cap, nothing worked. It's either a poor design or I have a defective product as it simply will not hold air.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew L

customer_reviews.title: Travel Pillow
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pillow for lower back support on a long overnight flight. The pillow doesn't need much air, took me a couple of times to get it right but once I did, it did the job. Easy to inflate/deflate and only took a couple minutes to get back in the bag. Very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy AZ

customer_reviews.title: Had to replace my original Air Comfy when I left it n the plane
customer_reviews.text: Had to replace my original Air Comfy when I left it n the plane. This pillow is very durable and can be used everyday for lumbar support in between trips. It is holding up well with daily use. This pillow also retains the air without seepage and deflation, which is not the case with a few other pillow supports I have owned.
customer_reviews.author: KennyG

customer_reviews.title: This pillow seems like it would work
customer_reviews.text: This pillow seems like it would work. However, the inner foam on mine must be faulty, as it wouldn't fully inflate even with valve all the way open. The foam also felt hard and lumpy. I had a very nice follow up email from the company asking me to contact them if I had any problems with the pillow. It's been five days since I emailed them, and no reply.... I've since returned the pillow. Could be a fluke or could be a quality control issue...not sure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Convenient travel pillow
customer_reviews.text: Finally had the opportunity to use my new AirComfy pillow on a long flight to Spain. I'm definitely a fan. It's much easier to carry than those bulky U-shaped travel pillows, and can be used in different positions. The strap that allows it to slip over the back of your seat is very helpful for securing it at neck-height. It inflates easily and also is easy to compress to return to its carrying sack. I'm only giving it four stars because I wish it were just slightly larger. As a neck pillow it's fine, but if you want to lean against the window to sleep, it's a bit small. Would not let that stop me from recommending it, however.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy O

customer_reviews.title: Find a better pillow, strap is unnecessary
customer_reviews.text: Honestly didn’t find this pillow that comfortable. The self inflating function is cool and the latch attachment made it easy to travel with, but the pillow wasn’t great. I ended up bundling a travel scarf on top of it for extra support on the plane. Also, the seatback strap isn’t a valuable addition. Unless you don’t care about blocking the entertainment screen of the person behind you and ruining their flight.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Travel perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love how easy it is to blow up and let out and be able to pack in small spaces. It's great for traveling and could definitely use it at home if I wanted. Would definitely recommend this product. And hopefully will be getting a few more in the future. Quality is great and comes with a soft adjustable eye mask and great carry case.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Good quality travel pillow
customer_reviews.text: I found out about this through an online survey rated this as no# 1. The transaction was super easy, really fast delivery and good information provided about the product from the seller. This was my first travel pillow I have bought, it looks and feels really good, I love the colour! and real easy to inflate in seconds. I actually found I did not end up needing to use as the pillow supplied on the flight was enough for me, but I am sure I will get more use of this travel pillow on future adventures, time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Nice adjustable pillow
customer_reviews.text: Love this travel pillow. You can inflate to desired comfort level and strap it on your headrest to stay in place. This is my second one because I forgot my last one on a flight so remember to take it with you when you leave your seat.
customer_reviews.author: David Roper

customer_reviews.title: Very durable with good build.
customer_reviews.text: Can be used as everyday lumbar support in between trips. Holds air without deflation or seepage. Broke my heart when I left it on the airplane, but I bought another one, albeit I had to choose a different color.
customer_reviews.author: KennyG

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Potential
customer_reviews.text: This could have been the best pillow ever but all the other reviewers were right, it starts leaking shortly after being used. I bought it for a 3 week trip to Europe. I have neck problems and it gave great support. However, 2 weeks after I started using it, it started leaking. Now it won't even hold air for 3 hours. I wish it worked because it's the best travel pillow I have ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Ghostwriter

customer_reviews.title: These are amazing
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. I have an older version which I love but this new one is even better. The fabric is so soft and cozy to lean against. I use my pillow in the car since the head rest never hits me quite right. I take it to the theater and use it as a head rest or back support. I have given them to family and friends and received many thanks for the gift. I ordered the grey one and it is a little more blue just like the photo here. I love the color which would be good for both men and women.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Nice pillow, provides extra lumbar support on my office ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice pillow, provides extra lumbar support on my office chair which already has a lumbar support. I just tuck it in behind the lumbar support that comes with the chair. Been using it for about 9 months, and would not want to be without it.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Pett

customer_reviews.title: Comfy & customizable.
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight and easy. It does self-inflate to some extent. Depending on where you want the pillow to support you, you may want to blow into it for one or two breaths to make it firmer. I used it on a long train ride to support my lower back. It worked really well. And one other reviewer wrote that it was hard to get back into the bag. I didn't find that to be true for me. I opened the valve, then started rolling the pillow from one end. When it was rolled up, I closed the valve and it fit nicely back into the bag. I would definitely recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Dragonfly

customer_reviews.title: you can adjust the softness/hardness of the pillow yourself.
customer_reviews.text: customer service is awesome. This is my second pillow from them. I have had the other pillow for many years and my husband nabbed it from me, so I got a new one. Have travelled in the car and on the plane with it, it is very good either way. My husband likes that you can attach it to the back of the seat
customer_reviews.author: Anne Varg

customer_reviews.title: Nice Pillow
customer_reviews.text: Nice pillow. I like that you can inflate it a little or a lot which allows perfect adjustment for your neck. This is much better than traditional neck pillows that I have used
customer_reviews.author: J. M. O'Neill

customer_reviews.title: Great Travel & Home Pillow
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my hub for a long plane trip we took in July. He used it as a back rest and was very glad he had it. It packs up small and blows up easily. Bought a second pillow for myself after I hurt my back. I used it continually for the past several weeks on the dining room chair, the kitchen chair, and when I was out. The wonderful feature is it works great with only a small amount of air --- so you get an extremely comfortable cushion back rest without having to lean against a big bubble of air. Great pillow!
customer_reviews.author: City Girl

customer_reviews.title: Design could use some improvement
customer_reviews.text: Super cushy feel and what appears to be good build quality. But I did not take it on my trip because its was not designed to support head leaning to one side. It also was rather bulky when collapsed. Company needs to make the sides higher. I ran out and purchased a inflatable sea to summit travel neck pillow instead and was glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: Mark P. Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Pregnant and can’t live without this
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this while pregnant after carrying around small pillows with me everywhere. This pillow is a life saver and my first recommendation to any other pregnant friends with back pain. I always have it for travel and honestly bring it with me anytime I’ll be sitting for more than 30+ min. clip makes it easy to attach to any bag. Overall, I love this pillow!
customer_reviews.author: Mal

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I like the pillow very much. It is comfortable and provides sufficient support, does not wrap your neck. It is easy to attach to a seat and keep attached during a flight even if you leave your seat. Surprisingly easy to push air out and get it back to the bag. Although it is larger in the bag than the most travel pillows filled with air, it is still light-weighted and the comfort beats the larger size.I have got questions from other travelers and a flight attendant because it looks very comfortable. So glad I found this pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Till

customer_reviews.title: Love this pillow
customer_reviews.text: I have had this pillow for 3 years and used it quite a lot. It packs nicely in my backpack or clipped to it. Fellow passengers look at me with envy while they either go without or have to lug a non inflatable pillow. The company’s customer support is over the top good.
customer_reviews.author: James Della Volpe

customer_reviews.title: Great travel accessory
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is durable and has a nice waterproof feeling to the exterior fabric. I have a similar product and was pleasantly surprised to find this one had a nozzle for ease of use and could automatically release air slowly if necessary! It comes with a convenient carrying case great for travel and compact in size great to throw in a bag. I also like how it is flatter so can be used not only against also seat but also if you also if you are lying down while travelling in an airport or train station! Great product and great price!
customer_reviews.author: The Russells

customer_reviews.title: Compact and versatile.
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is for so much more than air travel. It's wonderful for use as a pillow to use under or between your knees when sleeping or as lumbar support when sitting. It's easily transportable, too. While I was impressed with the pillow itself, I was even more impressed with the personal customer service directly from the creators of the AirComfy. They went above and beyond to ensure customer satisfaction - and even sent video instructions! I consider the AirComfy to be a smart purchase and a must-have travel essential.
customer_reviews.author: Song4Ten

customer_reviews.title: Good for travel, not quite enough height and starting to lose airtight hold
customer_reviews.text: I travel alot for work on long flights. I will say it has helped my back alot over the past month of using it however there could be a little more height in the shape, it doesnt seem to cover my entire lower back. Ive also noticed that its losing it air tight integrity. IE ive found it deflated after using it on the last flight I took. Over all a decent purchase, not amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Pillow, but remember to take it with you!!
customer_reviews.text: Very good pillow! Just enough to support the head and neck. I really enjoyed having it for the two trips I used it and it's not conspicuous. That has a good side and a bad one. Good: you're not lugging a big donut around everywhere. Bad: it blends in with the airplane seat and I forgot to take mine with me. I have filed with the lost and found for the airline, but they haven't found it... I'm sure someone else is making very good use of it! So that makes TWO happy customers for the price of ONE!
customer_reviews.author: Kristins

customer_reviews.title: I would not buy again
customer_reviews.text: Two of us travelling to Sweden; we each decided to purchase one of these. Deflated, they are about 8' in diameter and are light. Once inflated, they were difficult to use for neck support, somewhat easier to use as lumbar support, but not at all worth the price. We inflated these pillows fully, then released air to try to find a comfortable range. The flimsy airline pillows worked better, about 3 hours into the flight I deflated mine and just gave up.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel E.Sibley

customer_reviews.title: Got two of them -- both of them developed a leak
customer_reviews.text: Could be a great item, but it leaks air. One Star. Originally ordered one of these, but after about 2 weeks it started leaking. Got a replacement and same thing. I used it for lumbar support in the car and on airplanes. I never fully inflated the pillow, half full or less provided good lumbar support. I am returning the second one now and will buy something else. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: reviewguy

customer_reviews.title: Not suit for Portable use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for use on a business trip. But this is too big to carry. I have one more Eagle Creek Inflatable Travel Pillow, which is much smaller and more comfortable. Its size and weight are almost five times larger and heavier. it is inappropriate for portable use. In fact, pillows don't need self-inflating. The pillow fills up with just one or two breaths. Self inflating is a necessary feature for mattresses. I regret to purchase this.
customer_reviews.author: Sikorsky76pilot

customer_reviews.title: AirComfy Travel Pillow is a great product!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I just returned from a trip to England and found the AirComfyTravel Pillow a great item to take along! It made the flight so much more comfortable for my husband who has lower back discomfort. We had purchased the pillow for this trip but will now take it along when we go on road trips! We have both used it at home as well! We never fully deflated it to fold it up and put it in the carrying case. It was just as easy to take it along partially deflated and put it in luggage when we weren't using it.
customer_reviews.author: B McM

customer_reviews.title: AirComfy is Comfy
customer_reviews.text: I got this pillow to use daily for a carpool commute to work and back. It is the best neck pillow/cushion I've ever had. It is so much more comfortable than any other type which are usually too bulky. You can customize it since you have the ability to put more or less air in. I tend to use it a little less inflated. It seems to fit nicely in the back of my neck that way. It is also easily storable in a back of the chair pocket in the commuter van. Other riders want one after seeing mine!!
customer_reviews.author: TofuT

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer
customer_reviews.text: I was on the lookout for a compact travel pillow and this product has everything I was looking for, It's light, small, easy to inflate and super versatile. I am a big proponent of packing light and this pillow is perfect if you like to keep it minimalist like me!
customer_reviews.author: La Ha

customer_reviews.title: So So Support for Air Travel
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't the best neck and head support on my plane travels. I found that you had to keep the pillow halfway inflated for it to work its best primarily because fully inflated was too much cushion and your head was too forward. I also noticed that the inflation changed at takeoff and landing due to the air pressure changes. Other than that it seems to be well made so far, no issues with the quality of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Finally!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow. I have Fibromyalgia and traveling even short distances can be a struggle for me. I have tried several different travel pillows but none of them seemed to help very much. This pillow is really comfortable and even offers great neck support without being too firm. Best of all, it's adjustable. So if it needs to be softer I just let a little air out. It self inflates and even comes with a cloth bag to keep it in. I won't travel without it. You can purchase this with confidence. It is money well spent!
customer_reviews.author: Maureen A. Stanford

customer_reviews.title: The AirComfy Travel Pillow is the 'real deal'!
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased one AirComfy travel pillow, and after my wife and I had it for awhile we purchased another, plus two pillowcases. Last month we went round-trip economy class on an overseas flight from Seattle to Paris. My wife used hers around her neck and I used mine at the small of my back. End result? We highly recommend these well thought out and extremely comfortable travel aids.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: I was concerned at first but this is the best pillow. It fits perfectly against the window if ...
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned at first but this is the best pillow. It fits perfectly against the window if I am lucky enough to get a window seat. It rests nicely in the crook of your neck if I am sitting in the middle or aisle seat and with only a slight recline of the seat I am in heaven. I have also used it as a lumbar support. I love that I am not dragging around a bulky pillow like I see others do...it is simply attached with the clip provided to my backpack!!! Definitely recommend this for people who travel frequently!
customer_reviews.author: Cypress, TX

customer_reviews.title: Good for back support not so much for neck
customer_reviews.text: I thought this really helped with lumbar support. Used it in an international flight. It inflates easily. Deflating is also fairly easy. However I would not recommend this for a neck pillow. It isn’t comfortable and won’t stay in place very well.
customer_reviews.author: N. Maleque

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have bought and discarded pillows in airports -- searching for something that wasn't pushing the back of my neck. Hubby and I have long flights coming up, so I ordered two since lumbar support is critical and I wanted to test the product. I just ordered two more so that we both have neck and lumbar support. In addition to a timely delivery, I received a nice email from the sellers. Business as it ought to be. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Pammy

customer_reviews.title: Good for your neck and / or for lumbar support
customer_reviews.text: This cushion works exactly as advertised. It will self-inflate or you may blow it up for a firmer experience. I used it on recent flights to Europe (> 9 hrs. duration) and found it comfortable. I have also used it to increase lumbar support in my work seating. To me, it delivers value at a low cost, and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best travel pillow I’ve ever used
customer_reviews.text: Extremely Easy to transport when traveling and offers good compact support in varied positions depending on how you want to use it and you can easily inflate or deflate while using it for whatever position and firmness/softness level you prefer. Attaches to some airplane headrests so won’t have to deal with it falling when you lean away.
customer_reviews.author: - jr

customer_reviews.title: Many options for comfort
customer_reviews.text: I love this pillow. I’ve had several travel pillows this is the best by far. It gives you soon many options for for neck and back. Easy to inflate/deflate and take up very little room.
customer_reviews.author: Joefran

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and soft travel pillow
customer_reviews.text: This is a very unique pillow. I've never encountered a pillow that inflates itself. You simply open up the valve and the air starts to go in. It is very convenient to deflate it and put it back into its matching handy bag. It's also very soft which makes it very comfortable. I don't just use it for traveling but also at my home whenever I want a soft pillow. My parents used the pillow as well and they were very impressed as well. Definitely worth trying out.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan B.

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Lumbar Support.. Use it in my car daily
customer_reviews.text: While I originally bought this for air travel, I , frankly, did not find it that easy to use in an airplane seat for head comfort. But the strap made it easy to put in my car for lumbar support and then if going to a long meeting, I can grab it and take it inside with me. So it has become indispensable for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jewels

customer_reviews.title: Great for back support
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pillow as a back support for use on plane trips. It works great - inflates and deflates easily, adjustments in air pressure are easy to make while the pillow is in place. I also like that it comes in a bag that I can attach to my carry on as a reminder to take the pillow with me when I get off the plane. I've left two pillows on planes and have not been able to get them back so this is important to me. The only reason I gave it four stars instead of five is that it is more bulky than I'd like.
customer_reviews.author: Techno user

customer_reviews.title: Great for flying
customer_reviews.text: Great for flying, long car trips, etc. Very easy to use, inflate/deflate, store, adjust. The strap on the back is somewhat useful; I only used it on the carseat's headrest for long naps. Otherwise, the strap is pretty useless, especially if you are constantly adjusting it, depending on the type of seat.
customer_reviews.author: Colton Martin

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: I'm on a road trip right now and it might be the several hours of driving I just did but I don't think I've ever been as comfortable as I am in this passenger seat with this pillow behind my neck. For real, though, it provides great support and I could definitely see sleeping on this thing and waking up still relatively comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Rudy

customer_reviews.title: Best lower back relief for travel I have found!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been suffering from a lot of lower back discomfort, especially when sat for long periods such as planes. I ordered this and have now flown with it this about 6x and I have to say AMAZING. Not only is it perfect for my lower back but I tried it for the neck too and it is super comfortable. It packs nice and compactly in the pouch provided and I just clip it to my bag. I wouldn't hesitate in ordering this item again!!
customer_reviews.author: Mel Grant

customer_reviews.title: Great back support and very adjustable!
customer_reviews.text: Incredible! This has helped me recover from my back surgery. My first one developed a slow leak and when the manufacturer followed up to see how I liked it, I let them know I loved it, aside from the slow leak. They sent me another one immediately and it has been perfect! I have travelled with it and I use it in chairs when I sit down, for added support.
customer_reviews.author: LMG

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Quite hard when inflated fully, not very comfortable, and the finish is slippery, so it constantly slides in the airplane seat. Ended up using as inflatable lumbar support.
customer_reviews.author: SHCKR

customer_reviews.title: Love ❤️ it!
customer_reviews.text: Tried out my sister’s as she loves hers and had to get my own. Currently using it for a lower spine issue but it is truly a multi purpose pillow.
customer_reviews.author: PKS

customer_reviews.title: low impact living and compact self inflating is grrrreat!
customer_reviews.text: Just received it but I know this is a great purchase! It is soft enough on the neck do to a thin velvet like material. It self inflated and is comfortable. I bought it for a dual purpose...I'll use it as a headrest or lumbar support. I use the thermarest air cushion for my ass and that works great too. I suffered from a severe case of sciatica for 5 months this year for the first time and now that it's 90% healed I'll use all the comfort and support I can get. Low imapact living!
customer_reviews.author: Erik G

customer_reviews.title: Good Pillow
customer_reviews.text: Like this pillow, don't like the plastic spout. Like the control you have with the amount of air that you blow into the pillow, if you want it firmer you put more air into it, if you want it lest firm you can deflate it easily. The carry pouch is handy and I find I take it with me and use it in other places beside the car and on airplanes. I have brought it to the movies, beach, and picnics, it is really useful.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine L

customer_reviews.title: Really helped my back on an airplane
customer_reviews.text: Just used it on my first airline trip and it did help make those awful airplane seats more comfortable! The only drawback is that it is a little bulky. It is padded and not just a plastic blow up thing so that accounts for the bulk. It is also what makes it more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: J's Opinion

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I am thrilled with the AirComfy travel pillow! I just used it for a trip to New York City last week and it worked beautifully. Very comfortable and soft fabric. Kept my head from flopping to the side so I was actually able to sleep for a change!!! Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kat59

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I went through a few different travel pillows, and am very happy to have now found the AirComfy. The size and shape of this pillow are perfect while inflated, and it compacts down to a size that is much more convenient to travel with than "normal" travel pillows. Having this air inflated makes it easy to adjust to the right firmness. On a plane it holds my head well, and it does work well as a lumbar pillow, too. I have also used this while camping and it works OK (better than the ground or a pile of shirts and socks). Overall, I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Parlette

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customer!
customer_reviews.text: I have just returned from a trip that entailed two ten+ hour flights. The AirComfy travel pillow was a real winner for me. I slept comfortably with it on both flights and it was not awkward to carry waiting for flights to board, going through security and customs. I sat on it to deflate it as one customer suggested and that worked perfectly before landing. I would highly recommend it to anyone looking for a great travel pillow that is easy to carry and adjust to the cushion that is best for you. I am very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Jones

customer_reviews.title: Was a bit disappointed with this travel pillow
customer_reviews.text: Was a bit disappointed with this travel pillow. Purchased two for my hubby and me for a nine hour flight to Hawaii. First off, both clips broke shortly after attaching them to our luggage so we had to manually carry them since we couldn't put them in our carry-on luggage. Then we couldn't attach them to our headrest because of the video screens on the back of the seats so they were a bit awkward resting in place. The only good thing was that they were self inflated and easily to deflate when not being used.
customer_reviews.author: Purple Hues

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to inflate or deflate for different uses and is ...
customer_reviews.text: A friend with lower back issues similar to mine loaned me hers for an international flight, and I found helpful for my lower back as well as a pillow for my neck and head. Now I have my own AC travel pillow which travels with me in my car or is on my computer desk chair. The adjustable strap helps keep it in place when I sit in a chair. It is easy to inflate or deflate for different uses and is compact for packing when fully deflated.
customer_reviews.author: Dolores Maminski

customer_reviews.title: Stays inflated with no air loss.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to inflate. After my flight I am still using this to support my neck or back at home. I also used it as a leg spacer while sleeping, all with no need to reinflate. I also like that the cover can be removed for washing.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Tons of design and functionality problems
customer_reviews.text: This pillow loses air constantly. The air intake does not seal and the pillow has an inner core, which does not allow it to deflate into a small travel size. More problematic: The strap is too short and won't fit any airline seat or even around your shoulder to keep the pillow in place. I would not recommend this product and I have been trying it multiple times over multiple trips.
customer_reviews.author: Ian9084

customer_reviews.title: Swiss army knife of pillows.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, easy to pack, its very adjustable to your comfort level, add a lot of air to make it large and firm or release air to make it much smaller and softer. I also used it as a lumbar support for several flights while I was awake. Overall this is extremely versatile and much more useful than the typical horseshoe collar pillow.
customer_reviews.author: J. R.

customer_reviews.title: Nice and sturdy, but a few too many uncomfortable valves and straps.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Good and sturdy and supportive, although I was looking for more of a wraparound one. It is nice that the pillow self-expands. Cons: A bit too many rough corners, valves, and straps. Not exactly the most comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Whaley

customer_reviews.title: Great lumbar support
customer_reviews.text: Great little pillow. Right now I'm using it in my 2010 Toyota Rav 4 (the driver's seat is notoriously uncomfortable). I plan to bring on my next plane flight also. After my purchase I received an email from the company with helpful tips about how to get the best use from this pillow. They also gave additional tips about storage. Now that's what I call great customer service on top of a really neat little product!
customer_reviews.author: Griddy

customer_reviews.title: Good before it broke.
customer_reviews.text: Things were fine until the valve went bad. I squeeze the air out to put it in its bag, close the valve and voila! It reinflates fully in about 2 minutes. I can no longer adjust the amount of inflation to best comfort for me during travel . Can no longer easily Reba it. Was nice while it lasted. Attempts to contact the company online take me nowhere.
customer_reviews.author: Somnus

customer_reviews.title: The test is about to begin
customer_reviews.text: Just received this little jewel and tested it on work chair - seems to give good support. True test comes next week when to weeks of travel begin. Will update on my return.
customer_reviews.author: LuckyOne

customer_reviews.title: Great Travel (Neck support) Pillow
customer_reviews.text: I've tested this product, which was bought primarily for travels and lodging away from home, several nights now and love it! It rolls up to a convenient size for packing and inflates easily to the desired firmness. The shape is made to fit and support the neck without becoming a nuisance to your face or the back of the head like some of the "horseshoe" models used at night. It really does the trick--exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: I love how soft the fabric is
customer_reviews.text: I love how soft the fabric is. The design is also very functional for head or neck use. It’s compact yet it easily expands to the desired size. You do need to blow it up a bit the first time but after that it auto expands upon opening the valve. It has a convenient carrying bag. Great travel pillow.
customer_reviews.author: B. Young

customer_reviews.title: They especially liked the placement of the air valve on the seat ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the pillow and the seat pillow for my sister's trip to Hawaii and the report on their return was that the pillow and the seat cushion were life savers in terms of comfort not just on the plane but on beach chairs, cars & at the place they stayed. They especially liked the placement of the air valve on the seat cushion. Now they have asked me to get them the pillowcases for the neck pillow which was also used as a back support and it worked wonderful. Would recommend this product to anyone looking for good quality, versatility and comfort.
customer_reviews.author: samples

customer_reviews.title: Does what you need it for
customer_reviews.text: It would be better if it wasn't so slippery. Maybe needs a soft pillow case
customer_reviews.author: Gayle Skyberg

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT! the people in my row even wrote down ...
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT! the people in my row even wrote down what it was to order one. So easy to use, and doesn't look like a big silly horseshoe around your neck, and even though you don't have to blow it up, I found one puff makes it perfect! It squeezed down nicely back into my carry on. exactly what I was looking for! I've used it on 8 or 9 flights so far. It's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: JCorridan

customer_reviews.title: Just wasn't comfortable to use.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't seem to work out well at all. Couldn't get it to adjust the firmness to a useable comfort level. Maybe it would work for someone else but I didn't have any luck.
customer_reviews.author: Jawa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect lumbar travel pillow too!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the AirComfy travel pillow for our annual camping trip to Florida this June. It is a 12 hour drive and my back and behind get so sore. This pillow is wonderful! My back did not hurt for the first time! Now, it stays in the car and I use it everyday, going to work, or town, as well as long trips! I love this little pillow! What a great help. I highly recommend the AirComfy Travel Pillow. I also love that this company is a small family business! Don't hesitate to purchase this little gem, you won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great Pillow. Terrible strap.
customer_reviews.text: This is my almost 3 year review. It was great at first, I liked the control that you had to inflate or deflate as needed, but over the elastic strap became looser than my underwear. It doesn't stay in place, and Everytime you move a little forward, the pillow will sink which makes is very uncomfortable. Would I buy it again?? NO. Not unless they improve the strap.
customer_reviews.author: TPhung

customer_reviews.title: To small & doesn't stay in place.
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to pack & inflate but to small. Didn't stay in the position I wanted. Had very long flights so , was not easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: snowwhite

customer_reviews.title: Great pillow, much better quality / nicer material than other inflatable pillows.
customer_reviews.text: Great that it's totally adjustable, easy to blow up/deflate. (Doesn't automatically inflate as stated, but none of them do.) I clipped the chair strap off of mine so I could more easily fold up and stow in my travel tote bag - I use it as a lumbar pillow during train travel, so the strap is unnecessary. (I found it easier to fold in half than to roll up.)
customer_reviews.author: RealK

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. I bought it for airplane travel, but have been using it for everything. It's so compact and versatile. When I was on a newer airplane I found I didn't need it as much for thebsck so I used it as a pillow and it was so comfortable. Highly recommend this product for people who need extra lumbar support!
customer_reviews.author: T. McNiff

customer_reviews.title: Not durable due to poor quality materials
customer_reviews.text: bought it in May and it started leaking air in August. Took soapy water to it to try to find and repair the leak. The whole thing was leaking. It’s fine if you plan to use it on a short term basis only, but if you want something that works for more than three months, look elsewhere
customer_reviews.author: Skeet

customer_reviews.title: 6 days of sleeping in the car sitting up and I was the only one sleeping away comfortably. I would slip my hand through the band
customer_reviews.text: bought this for a National Park tour I did with a bunch of friends. 6 days of sleeping in the car sitting up and I was the only one sleeping away comfortably. I would slip my hand through the band and place it on my shoulder and lean to the right and it was like sleeping in bed. 8 hours of driving and not one neck ache at all. This is a super pillow, I started bringing it in out of the car to use in hotels when we would stop for a night. Thank you! Love your product.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold air.
customer_reviews.text: These just don't hold up. I've bought 2 of them now because I like the concept. The first one lasted about a year before it started leaking. The 2nd one, which I didn't use for 5 months after I bought it, didn't hold air for more than 30 minutes when I tried to use it today. So if you need a pillow for 10 minutes this might be for you.
customer_reviews.author: DRide52

customer_reviews.title: Great neck pillow not just lumbar support
customer_reviews.text: Great pillow as I've been using this at home and traveling. You can adjust softness or firmness base on your neck. I sleep good with this and price is affordable. Besides, you can roll this once air is removed with easy to carry on and with clip but not bulky. Highly recommended as now, I don't have to bring my other pillow that is small but bulky. Great invention and good quality!
customer_reviews.author: MC Hammer

customer_reviews.title: I did not find this pillow comfortable and ended up not using it the entire trip
customer_reviews.text: I did not find this pillow comfortable and ended up not using it the entire trip. There is nothing wrong with the pillow. It just isn't for me.
customer_reviews.author: jump rater

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable on the airplane
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband's recent 15-hour flight (2 red-eyes back to back). He said that, although the auto-fill feature is nice and he could easily attach the pillow to the outside of his backpack for easy carrying, it didn't work for him. It just made his head stick out more and he couldn't get comfortable. Not good for airplane seats that already have limited recline.
customer_reviews.author: Mother Sunshine

product_meta.title: AirComfy Inflatable Neck/Lumbar Pillow - Cervical Neck Support and Lumbar Back Pain Prevention with Airplane Travel Packsack - NO Pillowcase
feature_bullets: MULTIFUNCTIONAL USE - The contour design not only holds your head upright, it also provides knee and lower, mid or upper back support.
CONTROL YOUR COMFORT - Adjustable inflation allows you to choose if you want it soft or firm - making it suitable for men, women and kids of all ages.

TAKE IT EVERYWHERE - Excellent for office chairs, car headrests, backpacking, camping, physical therapy, hospital bed recovery, and pregnancy. BLACK AIRCOMFY HAS NO PILLOWCASE for ultimate compactability.
LIGHTWEIGHT TRAVELING - The collapsible design compresses into a portable packsack. Free up inner luggage space and clip it to your carryon.
HOLD IT IN PLACE - An expandable elastic band secures the pillow to seats, so you can move around and still maintain comfortable placement.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars1,316 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
